name: BoxChums
description:
In BoxChums, you are a box with many cuboid friends. Solve various puzzles using techniques learned along the way, and in the process, embark on an exciting adventure!

BoxChums is a Sokoban-inspired puzzle game created in PuzzleScript.

Controls:

  • X to start
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z to undo (everyone make mistakes!)
  • R to restart

Features:

  • Lots of puzzling levels
  • Three hidden easter eggs and a coded message
  • My first homemade soundtrack! Check it out here:
    • www.youtube.com/watch?v=GSO7QGwgL7M
